messages.subject: liberation and healing
messages.msgSnippet: ... Here we are! ::waving arms frantically:: We re a cyber-social setting, but I think we can manage caring and understanding. :o) I for one watched my family
messages.messageBody:
>>So, how does one recover? How does a person heal the wounds of religious
>>abuse? Hopefully, within a caring and understanding new social setting.>>

Here we are! ::waving arms frantically:: We're a cyber-social setting, but I
think we can manage caring and understanding. :o)

I for one watched my family church evolve into a cult complete with sexual
abuse and dogmatic church management of the most intimate details of
personal life. I'll be happy to take your hand and listen while you heal.

>>Remember also that it will pass.>>

Good words to hold onto. It gets better.

Life is good.
~Mary
